maintenance.title: Tiakitanga Paetukutuku
maintenance.description_1: Ka whakahou tonu tenei whaarangi ka pai ake te hoahoa.
maintenance.description_2: Ko te tumanako ka tukuna ta maatau paetukutuku i te mutunga o te tau.

button.NewWindow: Ka tuwhera te hono ki te matapihi hou, ripa ranei.

meta.title: Latest news, guides, and technology updates
meta.description: Latest news, and advice in technology. From emerging, and cutting-edge, technologies, to industry-leading, and established, companies. Learn how to protect your security and privacy while staying ahead in the tech world.

error.title: He raru
error.desc: Kua raru tetahi mea o to tono

landing.title: Nga Korero Hou
landing.desc: Tūmataitinga, Haumarutanga me nga mea katoa i waenga.

meta.title: Nga Panui Blog Hou
meta.description: Kei a Xanzhu nga korero mo nga hangarau hou. Te arotahi ki te ahuru me te ahuru o nga kaiwhakamahi

home.feature-desc: News, guides and reviews on technology, how to use it and how to ensure your data remains is protected online.
home.landing-desc: Xanzhu is a platform for sharing knowledge. Help set the standard for the next generation of privacy and accessibility. Teaches how to use technology and stay safe online.

privacy.title: Kaupapahere Tūmataiti
privacy.desc: Arotakehia ta matou tauākī kaupapa here tūmataiti
privacy.p-1: He mea nui ki a maatau muna me te whakaute ki te hunga e toro mai ana ki ta maatau paetukutuku. Kaore he korero tautuhi e penapena, e uru atu ana ranei ki te kore a koe e whakaaetia kia mohio kei poka ke to noho muna.
privacy.p-2: Na te mea kei roto i to maatau papaanga nga hononga ki nga paetukutuku tuatoru, kaore e taea e matou te aukati i te whai i waho o to maatau paetukutuku.
privacy.p-3: Raraunga whakamahi e whakaratohia ana e to kaitirotiro (User-Agent), kei roto nga wahitau IP, nga kaitirotiro me nga taputapu e whakamahia ana. Ka whakamahia enei raraunga mo nga inenga me nga korero a te tūmau.
